character.name: Aragorn

trait.name: Favored Enemy
entries: Orcs and goblinoids, undead. You have advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track your favored enemies, as well as on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.

trait.name: Natural Explorer
entries: Forest, mountains. When you make a Wisdom (Survival) check in your favored terrain, your proficiency bonus is doubled if you are using a skill that you're proficient with.

trait.name: Hunter's Prey
entries: Colossus Slayer. Your tenacity can wear down the most potent foes. When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, the creature takes an extra 1d8 damage if it's below its hit point maximum.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: You can make two attacks when you take the Attack action.

action.name: Andúril (Flame Tongue Longsword)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d8 + 8}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d8 + 9}) piercing damage.

character.customText: Aragorn, also known as Strider, is a Ranger of the North and heir to the throne of Gondor. He is skilled in tracking, survival, and combat, making him an ideal guide through dangerous lands.

entries: Aragorn is a weathered man in his eighties, though he appears much younger due to his Dúnedain heritage. He carries himself with quiet confidence and has piercing grey eyes that seem to see through deception.

As a Ranger, Aragorn is most at home in the wild, able to track enemies across vast distances and survive in harsh conditions. His knowledge of herb-lore and healing makes him valuable to any adventuring party.
Though he initially appears as a simple Ranger, Aragorn is actually Isildur's heir and the rightful king of Gondor and Arnor, though he spent most of his life unaware of his true heritage.

character.name: Hermione Granger

trait.name: Ritual Casting
entries: You can cast a wizard spell as a ritual if that spell has the ritual tag and you have the spell in your spellbook.

trait.name: Spellbook
entries: You have a spellbook containing all your wizard spells. You can copy spells from other spellbooks and scrolls into your book.

trait.name: Transmuter's Stone
entries: You can spend 8 hours creating a transmuter's stone that stores transmutation magic. A creature carrying or wearing it gains your choice of darkvision, increased speed, proficiency in Constitution saving throws, or resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

character.customText: Hermione Granger is a brilliant witch known for her extensive knowledge of magic theory and her quick thinking in dangerous situations. Her mastery of transmutation magic makes her invaluable for solving complex problems.

entries: Hermione is a young woman with bushy brown hair and bright, intelligent eyes. She carries herself with confidence and always seems to have her nose in a book when not actively adventuring.

Born to non-magical parents, Hermione discovered her magical abilities at age 11 and has since become one of the most accomplished witches of her generation. Her thirst for knowledge drives her to study every magical text she can find.

Though sometimes seen as a know-it-all, Hermione's vast knowledge and quick thinking have saved her friends countless times. She believes strongly in justice and equality, often standing up for the oppressed.
